attributes.action: Reduce Urban Speed Limits and help save lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,

Please reduce urban speed limits and improve the quality of life for millions of people living in the UK. Hundreds of pedestrian’s lives are taken on the roads every year in our towns and cities (as well as suffering thousands of life changing injuries), many of these would still be alive today if speed limits were reduced and steps were taken to eliminate the culture of speeding that exists on our roads.
These steps would have no negative consequences with journey times staying the same or even decreasing due to more efficient use of junctions.
It has also been shown that there would be significant savings to the economy due to reduction of accidents with its associated disruption to normal traffic flow, use of police and medical staff and equipment as well as staff sickness.
Prime minister, reduce the speed limits in built up areas and make the UK a better and safer place to live for all of us.

Best regards,
Mr Dominic Tyler
